main_definition: Variation refers to the concept of change or diversity in forms, types, or characteristics within a certain context.

meanings_and_examples.example: The variation in weather patterns has become more noticeable with climate change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Differences among individuals or things within a group
meanings_and_examples.example: Genetic variations explain why siblings look different from each other, even though they share the same parents.
Each song in this playlist represents a variation on a common theme.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Different versions or models of the same thing
meanings_and_examples.example: The latest smartphone model comes with several variations, including different sizes and colors.
Slang terms are often a variation of standard words to convey informality or group identity.
